headline: Who will win the battle of U.S. retail media?
summary: Investing.com -- Walmart (NYSE:WMT), Costco (NASDAQ:COST), and Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT) continue to race to capture a larger slice of the fast-growing U.S. retail media market, which could double to $100 billion by 2028 and account for nearly one-fifth of total media ad spend.

headline: Consumers Embrace Early School Shopping Amid Prime Day and Other Marquee Sales
summary: July has historically been a slower month for retailers, but families have begun school shopping earlier in recent years, analysts said.

headline: 5 Relatively Secure And Cheap Dividend Stocks, Yields Up To 9% (July 2025)
summary: It is best to invest regularly and consistently in good, solid dividend-paying stocks with reasonable or attractive valuations. Check out five such stocks here.
